dct_title_s: Africa, with all its states, kingdoms, republics, regions, islands, &ca. improved and inlanrged from D'Anville's map: to which have been added a particular chart of the Gold Coast, wherin are distinguished all the European forts and factories ... and also a summary description relative to the trade and natural produce, manners and customs of the African continent and islands
dct_description_sm: by S. Boulton ; published by Laurie & Whittle.
Includes decorative cartouche, ill., text and inset maps "A particular chart of the Gold Coast ..." and "Azores or western islands."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
